UPDATE `t_contents` SET
`title` = #{set.title},
`slug` = #{set.slug},
`created` = #{set.created},
`modified` = #{set.modified},
`content` = #{set.content},
`author_id` = #{set.authorId},

`comments_num` = #{set.commentsNum},

`allow_ping` = #{set.allowPing},
`allow_feed` = #{set.allowFeed},
`cid` in
#{item} and
`cid` >= #{where.cidSt} and
`cid` <= #{where.cidEd} and
`title` in
#{item} and
(
`Title` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Title` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and

) and

) and
(

) and
`author_id` in
#{item} and
`author_id` >= #{where.authorIdSt} and
`author_id` <= #{where.authorIdEd} and
`type` in
#{item} and

) and
